# üêõ Report Bug Prompt

## Instructions for AI Agent

When a bug is discovered, create a detailed bug report using this template.

### Output Location

**IMPORTANT:** All bug reports must be saved to: `docs/incidents/bugs/`

File naming convention: `incidents-history-YYYY-MM-DD-<bug-description>.md`

**For more information, see:** [docs/incidents/README.md](../../docs/incidents/README.md)
